welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kontich, Belgium! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of our historic city, known for its picturesque architecture and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and savor all that Kontich has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport is used for freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is the largest terminal at Brussels Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves regional and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all cargo and freight operations at Woensdrecht Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free. Login information can be obtained at the information desk.
